scripts.dev:mock: npm run ishhrunning && npm run clean && npm run genabi && next dev --turbopack
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run genabi && next dev --turbopack
scripts.dev-webpack: npm run clean && npm run genabi && next dev
scripts.copy:wasm: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const src1='node_modules/@zama-fhe/relayer-sdk/dist/tfhe_bg.wasm';const src2='node_modules/@zama-fhe/relayer-sdk/dist/kms_lib_bg.wasm';const dst1='public/tfhe_bg.wasm';const dst2='public/kms_lib_bg.wasm';try{fs.mkdirSync('public',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src1,dst1);fs.copyFileSync(src2,dst2);console.log('[copy:wasm] Copied WASM files');}catch(e){console.warn('[copy:wasm] Skipped:',e.message);}"
scripts.fetch:sdk: curl -fSL -o public/relayer-sdk-js.umd.cjs https://cdn.zama.org/relayer-sdk-js/0.3.0-5/relayer-sdk-js.umd.cjs || echo "[fetch:sdk] CDN download failed or skipped"
